sqlMap.select:
SELECT ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY, DISPLAYORDERONE, DISPLAYORDERTWO, ZDCUSTMANAGER,
DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'01'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'01'_A"),SUM("'01'_A")) ZHGPDTIMEONE, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'02'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'02'_A"),SUM("'02'_A")) ZHGPDTIMETWO, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'03'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'03'_A"),SUM("'03'_A")) ZHGPDTIMETHREE, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'04'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'04'_A"),SUM("'04'_A")) REVIEWAPPROVALONETIME, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'05'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'05'_A"),SUM("'05'_A")) REVIEWAPPROVALTWOTIME, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'06'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'06'_A"),SUM("'06'_A")) REVIEWAPPROVALTHREEORMORETIME, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'07'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'07'_A"),SUM("'07'_A")) ALLPROCESSTIMEONE, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'08'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'08'_A"),SUM("'08'_A")) ALLPROCESSTIMETWO, DECODE(SUBSTR(SUM("'09'_A"), 1, 1), '.', 0 || SUM("'09'_A"),SUM("'09'_A")) ZLWZHAPPROVALTIME FROM (SELECT ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY, ZDCUSTMANAGER, t.displayorderone, t.displayordertwo, t.TIMELIMITTYPE, nvl(SUM(worktime), 0) worktime FROM process_UsedTime_Report t WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.INSERTTIME = (SELECT MAX(g.INSERTTIME) FROM process_UsedTime_Report g)
T.REPORTTIME>=#repTimeStart#
T.REPORTTIME <=(#repTimeEnd#)
T.orgCodeOne='$orgCodeOne$'
T.orgCodeTwo='$orgCodeTwo$'
T.ONECATEGORY in ($oneCategory$)
T.LOANCATEGORY in ($loanCategory$)
t.zdCustManager like '%$zdCustManager$%'
GROUP BY ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY, ZDCUSTMANAGER, displayorderone, displayordertwo, TIMELIMITTYPE) PIVOT(SUM(worktime) A FOR TIMELIMITTYPE IN('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07', '08', '09')) GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((ORGNAMEONE, ORGCODETWO, ORGNAMETWO, ONECATEGORY, LOANCATEGORY,ZDCUSTMANAGER,displayorderone,displayordertwo, "'01'_A", "'02'_A", "'03'_A", "'04'_A", "'05'_A", "'06'_A", "'07'_A", "'08'_A", "'09'_A")) order by DISPLAYORDERONE,DISPLAYORDERTWO
